entry.title: That Which Cannot Die
entry.summary:
Author: IIALFAII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,157Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 75

Summary: When Merlin is lost to Arthur in a way he cannot understand, the prince is left shattered—adrift in a world colder and lonelier than he ever imagined. But grief is only the beginning. When Merlin returns, changed and without memory of being gone, or why, Arthur confronts a truth he never expected: Merlin is his soulmate, the missing piece that makes him whole. As their bond rekindles and deepens, Arthur will fight against all odds to protect the man he cannot live without. Together, they must navigate secrets, danger, and their own hearts—discovering that love can rise from even the darkest of tragedies, and that some souls are destined to be forever entwined.
